description: Builds and maintains trusted relationships with day-to-day client contacts, demonstrating professionalism and credibility.
Understands core EX principles and contributes relevant thinking to client solutions.
Supports commercial scoping, tracks time effectively, and understands how work delivers value to clients and the agency.
Understands the agency proposition and communicates it confidently with clients and colleagues.
Brings client context and insight into the delivery process, ensuring cohesion with PMs and DoCs.
Takes ownership of small scopes or parts of larger projects and responds proactively to client needs.
Contributes to collective success, brings curiosity, asks questions, and supports others.
